root.description: The enchanted tree root retreat back into the walls of the trench as the [stone] returns the mist to the [gate].

exit.description: The [clearning] is at the top of the slope.
exit.detailedDescription: Star speckle the sky above the [clearning].

exit.description: A glowing [gate] of swirling purple mist stands at the end of the trench.
exit.detailedDescription: One does not simple walk through this gate. There must be some kind of mechanism to open it.

prop.description: [Moss] covers the walls of the trench.
prop.detailedDescription: The moss is dry and grey.

prop.description: A group of polish [tiles] are pressed into the wall need the gate.
prop.detailedDescription: At the center of the [tiles] is a small hole. A purple, glowing [stone] hovers inside.

prop.description: A leaf of [paper] rests on the ground.
prop.detailedDescription: A note is written in Joss's hand: "To (use) and item in your (inventory) type 'use' then the item's name and then the name the thing you want to use the item on, and then hit ENTER. For example, to look a gate, a witch could type 'use stone hole'."

item.detailedDescription: It glows purple as though it is full of energy.
